IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_arena_rank') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_arena_rank GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_arena_rank @mode TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
CREATE TABLE #Temp_Arena_Rankers ( rank INT IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY, character_id INT UNIQUE, score INT )
CREATE INDEX temp_arena_rankers_score_idx ON #Temp_Arena_Rankers (score)
INSERT INTO #Temp_Arena_Rankers SELECT character_id, score FROM dbo.Arena_Records WHERE mode = @mode ORDER BY score DESC
UPDATE dbo.Arena_Records SET rank = ( SELECT rank FROM #Temp_Arena_Rankers WHERE character_id = A.character_id) FROM dbo.Arena_Records A WHERE A.mode = @mode
DROP TABLE #Temp_Arena_Rankers
SET NOCOUNT OFF
